nodes.text: Doctor Chelli Aphra undertook a raid to the Great Temple on the forest moon Yavin 4 at the behest of her father, Korin Aphra, in order to obtain specific coordinates, which the senior Aphra believed would lead them to the lost Ordu Aspectu at the Citadel of Rur. However, when Chelli Lona Aphra's crew arrived at the Massassi Site, they regretted to find that the Site was occupied and under investigation by multiple platoons of the Galactic Empire's Martial Forces under the command of Captain Magna Tolvan.
